title: UI Enhancer Settings
description: Configuration for UI enhancement and theming

enabled.title: Enable UI Enhancement
enabled.description: Master switch for all UI enhancements

primary_color.title: Primary Color
primary_color.description: Primary theme color in hex format (e.g., #3F51B5)

accent_color.title: Accent Color
accent_color.description: Accent color for buttons and highlights in hex format

text_size_multiplier.title: Text Size Multiplier
text_size_multiplier.description: Multiplier for text sizes (0.5 = half size, 2.0 = double size)

corner_radius.title: Corner Radius
corner_radius.description: Corner radius for buttons and UI elements in pixels

target_packages.title: Target Packages
target_packages.description: List of packages to apply UI enhancements to. Use '*' for all packages.

enhance_text_views.title: Enhance Text Views
enhance_text_views.description: Apply custom styling to text views

apply_dark_theme.title: Apply Dark Theme
apply_dark_theme.description: Apply dark theme styling to UI elements

animate_transitions.title: Animate Transitions
animate_transitions.description: Enable smooth transitions for UI changes
